passages.text:
I DUNNO MAYBE THERES A NUKE HERE?


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: BAD ENDING 8 CATASTROPHIC

passages.text:
You almost made it, you almost didn't 
   <red> GET SWATTED <red>
THEY BUST DOWN YOUR FRONT DOOR
CLIMB OUT OF YOUR TOILET IN SCUBA GEAR
THEY WILL GET YOU

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: BIG BAD END 4

passages.text:
As the words leave you lips you notice a laser on your chest, and hear a loud bang from your front door, a S.W.A.T. team has broken into your apartment. 

<Red> YOU HAVE BEEN SWATTED <red>

Bad End 1 Rip Bozo

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End 1

passages.text:
You Died

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End 2

passages.text:
The water in your apartment is contaminated with arsnic, hope you enjoy throwing up till you die. The Swat agents listening in shrug, to them you're just another potential terrorist taken care of.

Remember to pay attention to your water supply, weird smells and strange apearances are important to take care of.


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End 4

passages.text:
A message appears on your screen from an unknown source
"I agree man but you shouldn't of said that out loud."

You barely have to time read that message before 
<red> YOU GOT SWATTED <red>
THE TEAM BREAKS THROUGH YOUR WINDOWS
YOUR LANDLORD WILL CHARGE FOR THOSE
LOST YOUR DEPOSIT AND GOING TO JAIL


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End Landlords

passages.text:
FAIL HORRIBLY


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad Ending 6

passages.text:
REALLY BAD END LIKE BAD


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad Ending 7

passages.text:
Bad time kid, stop sucking.

DEAD


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad end 3

passages.text:
COCAINE IS BAD THE CONTRABAND WILL BE COLLECTED
<red> YOU GOT SWATTED <red>
Agents start coming through your windows! Red lasers are everywhere!
You barely manage to snort a bag of coke before you're getting tackled!

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad end funny alt lvl4

passages.text:
This is it, the revolution begins with you. You said all the right things and made all the right moves.

GG Pro gamer skills

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Best Ending

passages.text:
A Bad Choice ends the game they get SWATTED
A Neutral choice from any path moves them to the Neutral Prompts
A Good Choice Moves them to the next Good Prompt

Rules:
Prompts can have up to 80 characters.
Answers can have up to 25 characters.


Bad ends            4 /16
Easter Egg Ends      2/3

Neutral choices   2/12
Neutral prompts   4/4
Neutral ends          2/4

Good options        0/9    
Good prompts      3/4
Good Ends             1/4

Prompt one:  COMPLETE
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 1
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 2
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 3
B1 N2 G1

Neutral Prompt 4
B2 N1 G1


Good Prompt 1
B2 N1 G1

Good Prompt 2
B2 N1 G1

Good Prompt 3 
B3 N1 G1

Good Prompt 4
B3 N1 G1
passages.name: Developer notes

passages.text:
You were a spy all along and can't risk them hearing what you need to say. By not taking this call though you can't pass on any information to the other agent, you have been fired.

Game over agent.


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Easter eggs

passages.text:
"After losing my lighter I had to pick up a new one, I also picked up _____ at the store."

[[napalm->Bad End 2]] 

[[a new bandana ->Neutral prompt 1]] 

[[silly straws ->Neutral prompt 1]] 

[[a multi-tool with a knife ->Good prompt 2]]
passages.name: Good Prompt 1

passages.text:
"My neighbors started a fire outside the apartment, I still see it from my window, I need to _____ after this."

[[terrorize my insurance ->Bad End 4]]

[[Have you considred dissasocsiating? You seem like you are. ->Neutral Prompt 3]]

[[You can read right? ->Neutral Prompt 3]] 

[[Don't need a hand to hold ->Good Prompt 4 Final]]

links.name: Have you considred dissasocsiating? You seem like you are.
Don't need a hand to hold

passages.name: Good Prompt 3

passages.text:
I dunno but this one is gonna be hard. 3 bad ends, one neutral, and one good, This leads to TRUE GOOD ENDING

[[Bad things here->Bad Ending 6]]

[[Some how and even worse option->Bad Ending 7]]

[[WORST ENDING IN GAME ->BAD ENDING 8 CATASTROPHIC]]

[[Final Neutral option ->Good turned Neutral Ending]]

[[Best answer here ->Best Ending]]

links.name: Some how and even worse option

passages.name: Good Prompt 4 Final

passages.text:
You are somewhat problematic for the agents listening in, but you haven't said anything they could really consider a threat. You continue to be monitored but nothing changes.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Good ending 1

passages.text:
"I'm going camping this weekend to test my survival skills, I have a ____ coming up."

[[riot ->Bad end 3]] 

[[hiking trip ->Neutral Prompt 3]] 

[[scouts test ->Neutral Prompt 3]] 

[[hunting trip ->Good Prompt 3]]
passages.name: Good prompt 2

passages.text:
Good turned Neutral path ending, you are definitly up to something but maybe not over throwing the goverment.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Good turned Neutral Ending

passages.text:
Your life is fairly boring and safe, you just chat with you friend and vent about a few things. You never even notice when they eventually take bugs out of your apartment as they mark you down as not a threat.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]

passages.name: Neutral Prompt 3

passages.text:
"It sucked, then I was late for work because _____."

[[bad life choices lead you here ->Bad end 3]] 

[[Learn to do better ->Neutral Prompt 2]] 

[[Seriously learn from your mistakes->Neutral Prompt 2]]

[[Look a good choice for once in you life ->Good Prompt 3]]

links.name: bad life choices lead you here
Look a good choice for once in you life

passages.name: Neutral prompt 1

passages.text:
"So anyway, I think if my landlord keeps raising rent I'm gonna _____"

[[overthrow the goverment ->BIG BAD END 4]] 

[[cry in the tub ->Neutral End]]

[[have to move ->Neutral End]] 

[[go live with my friends in the woods ->Good ending 1]]

passages.text:
